headline: Here is What to Know Beyond Why Western Digital Corporation (WDC) is a Trending Stock
summary: Western Digital (WDC) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.

summary: Dell's strong fourth-quarter results show the company is navigating the memory shortage well so far.

headline: Smartphone market poised for 'sharpest decline on record' in 2026
summary: Two recent reports predict further declines in the smartphone market in 2026, as dwindling memory supplies continue to drive up prices of consumer electronics.

headline: How Western Digital’s Debt Cleanup And G-DRIVE Rebrand At Western Digital (WDC) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Western Digital recently completed the full redemption of its 2.850% Senior Notes due 2029 and 3.100% Senior Notes due 2032, while also rebranding its creator-focused external storage portfolio under the unified G-DRIVE name following its separation into a standalone HDD company in 2025. Taken together, the debt redemption and G-DRIVE consolidation point to a cleaner balance sheet and a clearer brand message aimed at professional content creators who demand high-capacity, high-performance...

headline: Is Western Digital (WDC) Still Reasonably Priced After Its Recent Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Western Digital's share price still reflects fair value after a huge run, you are not alone. This article will help you size up what you might actually be paying for. The stock last closed at US$282.25, with returns of 11.7% over 30 days, 50.4% year to date and a very large gain over the past year. Recent headlines around Western Digital have focused on its position in data storage and memory solutions, as well as investor interest in companies linked to data...
